TopicTitle: A bug about Galaxied Unbound :Game Crash when entering new system (CheckEncounter: failed to find any intercepts at all)

Articles.Content: I used the FTL(Faster Than Light) engine from Intersteller mod to the AlphaCentauri system. But when I almost entered it, the game failed to response and crashed. The log was full of "CheckEncounter: failed to find any intercepts at all" at the end. I have set the "Always show closest encounter to target" off and the curve to"2, relevant"  but it still happened every time. How to solved this?
